inn1.comm: short of a length on the pads, Parthiv nudges towards square to get going
good length outside off stump, Rahane stays in his crease and lets the ball pass
Anderson pitches outside off but closer to the batsman this time, Rahane stays back and defends

caught at slip! Anderson angles the ball into the right-hander, pitches on a great length close to off stump, and gets it to seam away from the batsman. Rahane stays in his crease and pokes tentatively. The ball takes the edge and goes straight to Trott at first slip. It's Rahane's first failure on the tour. Had to happen some time.
good length delivery outside off, Dravid gets beaten
Anderson strays down leg side this time, he'll have to bowl that again
good length but too wide outside off for Dravid to play
left alone outside off stump
width offered outside off stump, Parthiv lets it go
Bresnan goes up in appeal after Parthiv moves forward to defend and gets hit on the pad before the bat, that would have slanted across the off stump, or might have just clipped it
Parthiv gets beaten by one that lifts from just short of a length
Bresnan delivers with a round-arm action and fires it way down leg side
wide outside off stump, Parthiv swishes and misses
defended back towards the bowler
terrific ball, Anderson angles in towards off stump, pitches on a good length and seams it away. Dravid gets squared up but manages to defend towards the off side
strays on to the pads this time, allowing Dravid to glance towards fine leg
Anderson drops a bit shorter but not too wide outside off, Parthiv cuts and hits the ball into the ground towards point
pushed off the back foot towards cover point
that's a wild shot, an attempted pull against a delivery that angled across him from over the wicket and was quite wide outside off, he didn't make contact
cut off the back foot between the slips and point
Bresnan hits a good length around leg stump, Parthiv stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
similar ball and Parthiv defends once again towards midwicket
good length on middle and off, Parthiv moves forward and defends on the off side
Parthiv punches the ball towards the right of mid-off and sets off
Dravid leans across to push a full ball towards the right of mid-on
Parthiv cuts smoothly but can't place the ball past the fielder at point
After seaming a few away, Anderson jags this one in off the pitch, Dravid stays on the back foot and defends
Dravid tries to glance a leg-side delivery but doesn't get bat on it, the ball goes off the thigh towards fine leg
Dravid pushes forward and away from the body at one outside off stump, he gets an edge which falls short of second slip, played with soft hands
Dravid drops the ball at his feet and begins to run, Parthiv doesn't want it, India have been unable to rotate strike
ripper from Anderson, pitches on a good length and cuts in sharply, finding the gap between Dravid's bat and pad. Went over off and middle stump, that one did
defended off the back foot on the off side
Parthiv plants his foot forward and tries to drive a length delivery which is wide outside off, he mis-times it

Dravid's run out! Parthiv pushes the ball towards mid-off and runs. Dravid is slow to respond and slow while running. Anderson swoops on the ball, picks up with one hand, lets it rip at the striker's end and scores a direct hit. Dravid didn't sprint, or dive or try to get in the line of the ball. He even looked behind to see where the ball was, which slowed him down. He's gone by a distance. That bit of running was from a bygone era.
left alone outside off
good length and straight, Kohli defends on the leg side
Bresnan bowls another one on a good length but it's a touch straight, Kohli defends towards midwicket
pushed confidently off the front foot towards cover
Anderson nips the ball in off a good length and hits Kohli on the pad, the appeal for lbw is not successful, it's too high
nudged off the pads through square leg
Kohli pushes away from his body and gets an edge to a good length delivery towards third man

Anderson destroys the stumps. He bowls a full ball for the first time, after several good length ones. Parthiv is stuck in his crease and falls over towards the off as he attempts to play across the line. He misses and loses middle stump
Anderson wants to give Raina a short one first up but mis-directs it down leg side
Raina comes forward to a good length ball and defends towards the bowler

huge appeal for lbw after Raina offers no shot and is hit on the pad while standing inside his crease. That might have been a bit high, or it might have pitched outside leg stump. Definitely too close to try and leave.
played towards the leg side
Bresnan delivers a full ball outside off stump, Kohli tries to drive but gets beaten by the slight movement away from him
loud shout for lbw after Bresnan nips the ball sharply into the right-hander and hits the pad, that was missing leg though
Kohli defends on the off side this time
good length ball outside off, Kohli lets it go
Kohli moves forward and tries to push towards cover, he gets beaten by a full ball that moves away from him. India have little idea of what's going on at the moment, or how to deal with it
short of a length and a bit straight, Raina gets off the mark by nudging off his hips towards square
too straight once again and Kohli flicks through square leg, I don't think we've had a boundary yet
Kohli moves across and nudges towards the leg side for a single
defended from the crease towards the off side
Raina moves back and pushes a good length ball towards midwicket
the ball pitches outside off on a good length and jags away from the right-hander, bating Kohli's forward push
good length delivery seaming across the left-hander, left alone by Raina
similar line and length and Raina lets it go again
Bresnan pitches outside off and slants the ball way, Raina strides forward and lifts his bat out of the way

finally there's a boundary and it's greeted with loud cheers. Raina hops across in his crease and fends awkwardly at a short ball that rises into his ribs. He gets an edge down leg side and Kieswetter can't catch it.

whoa, Raina tries to send that ball into orbit with a mighty heave aimed over the midwicket boundary. The length is good from Bresnan and Raina connects with nothing. The ball passes over middle stump.
Raina moves across to a full ball and clips it towards deep square
Kohli stays in his crease and defends a length ball towards cover

Kohli's struggle has ended and this is now too easy for Anderson. He pitches just short of a length outside off and seams the ball away, Kohli stays in his crease and hangs his bat out, getting an edge to the wicketkeeper. Soft, soft dismissal. Anderson is having a terrific game, three wickets and a direct hit, in his 150th ODI.
Dhoni moves across his stumps and shoulders arms to a good length ball
full ball outside off, Dhoni moves forward and drives, he manages to beat the dive from the fielder at mid-off and scores India's first proper boundary of the day
Anderson pitches on a good length outside off and seams it away from Dhoni who lets it go
Dhoni once again lets the ball pass outside off stump
Bresnan continues to give very little, pitching on a good length around off, Raina defends from his crease
Bresnan pitches on a good length outside off and seams it away from the left-hander sharply, Raina pushes forward without any conviction and gets beaten by a long way
Raina chooses to play from his crease and nudges towards square
short of a length outside off, Raina sways out of the way
Raina stays rooted to his crease and pokes at one that pitches short of a length and seams away from him. Beaten again.
Raina now takes a huge stride forward and shoulders arms to one that slants across him
Dhoni tries to pull one that isn't too short and gets hit in the mid-section
Anderson is relentless with his line around off and Dhoni can't do much but defend from the crease
Dhoni stands in his crease and tries to force the ball through cover with a back-foot drive, it's not happening for him and he gets an inside edge on to the pad
this time he tries to just defend on the off and gets another inside edge that hits the pad and goes close to the stumps, the batsmen steal a single
he's teed off! Raina finally gets one in his hitting zone, a fullish ball on middle stump, and he launches it high and far over the midwicket boundary. Huge hit
defended on the off side
Dhoni walks forward and outside off but then leaves the ball after Dernbach pitches wider outside off
short of a length and straight, defended off the back foot on the leg side
short ball and Dhoni pulls off the back foot along the ground to the midwicket boundary
Dhoni stays back and defends a good length ball towards the off side
Dhoni gets an inside edge on to the thigh as he tries to play a length ball from inside his crease, he get a single towards fine leg
full ball on leg and middle, Raina leans forward and places the ball wide of mid-on
fuller ball on middle stump, Raina moves forward and pushes the ball through midwicket
width offered outside off, Raina stays back, moves towards the off and opens the face to guide behind point
Dhoni moves forward to defend but gets hit on the thigh by one that nips back from a good length around off stump
Raina moves across in his crease and flicks a length ball from leg and middle through square
Raina tries to defend but gets a thick outside edge towards point
Broad pitches on a good length outside off and angles the ball away, Raina lets it go
fuller length on off and middle from Dernbach, Dhoni pushes towards the leg side from his crease
good length outside off, left alone by Dhoni
shorter length outside off stump, Dhoni waits in his crease, and drives it late through the gap between point and cover point, superbly timed
Dhoni moves across and defends on the leg side
fuller length outside off and Dhoni launches into a powerful drive through cover point, Trott's been moved to the deep though after the previous boundary
there's that slower ball from Dernbach, delivered from the back of the hand, Raina clips it off his pads behind square
short of a length delivery pitches around off and seams away from Raina who stays on the back foot and pokes, he gets beaten
fuller length, drawing Raina into the front-foot drive away from the body and beating the bat with seam movement away from the left-hander
now Raina tries to cut a length ball that's much too close to his body, he gets beaten again
good length close to off stump, Raina stays in his crease and lets the ball pass
good length once again close to off stump, a touch on the fuller side, Raina shoulders arms
Broad completes a maiden over with a good length ball outside off, Raina lifts his bat out of the way
good length outside off stump, Dhoni stays in his crease and lets it go
Dhoni moves forward and defends a good length ball towards cover
shorter length outside off, Dhoni remains on the back foot and offers no shot

Dernbach gets the ball to angle in off a good length and hit Dhoni on the pad as he played across the line from the crease. A bit high and probably missing leg. The ball-tracking shows it clipping the outside of the top of leg stump. So good decision.
Raina stays in his crease to block and gets an inside edge on to the pad
a slower ball, defended on the front foot towards the off side
Dhoni moves forward to drive a full ball but can't beat mid-on
Dhoni moves across to glance a short of a length ball off his hips towards fine leg where Steven Finn, the substitute, makes a sliding save
fuller length on middle and leg, Dhoni moves across in his crease and pushes towards midwicket
Dhoni uses the angle into him to nudge the ball through square, Dhoni seemed to want a second, Raina did not
Raina moves back and across to defend on the leg side

caught behind! A rubbish shot. Broad pitched short around middle and off and angled the ball away from the left-hander. Raina cleared his front foot out of the way and slogged, aiming for deep midwicket. He was trying to pull from miles outside off and got an edge through the the wicketkeeper. Hideous shot.
defended on the back foot towards point
pushed towards cover from the crease
Dernbach pitches on a good length outside off and gets the ball to hold its line, Dhoni plays inside it and is beaten
pushed towards cover for a single
he gets behind the line of a short of a length ball and defends with a straight bat off the back foot
Jadeja cuts a short and wide ball towards third man to retain strike
edged but it falls short of second slip. Jadeja pushed at a good length ball from his crease
edged but it falls well short of the keeper. Broad pitches on a good length and seams it away from Jadeja who stays in his crease and pokes. Or was that pad?
defended on the back foot towards cover
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
shot! Jadeja stays in his crease and with minimal movement of the body manages to punch the ball through cover, he was well balanced and timed it properly
Jadeja punches the ball off the back foot towards point where Bell dives to his left and cuts it off
good length from Dernbach close to off stump, Dhoni defends on the off side
Dhoni moves forward to a full ball and drives past the bowler
short of a length and straight, defended on the back foot
good length ball and the line is very straight, defended on the leg side
the slower ball gone wrong, that's too wide outside off
too straight this time, Dhoni nudges off his pads towards fine leg, oh it's a leg bye
defended on the back foot towards point
Dhoni nudges on the front foot towards midwicket
Dhoni strides forward and drives towards long-on
Swann goes round the wicket and angles into the left-hander, Jadeja defends
Jadeja tries to drive a full ball off the pads on the leg side but misses
pushed on the front foot on the off
what was that? Dhoni pushes forward and then tries to close the face to one a fair bit outside off stump, he gets a leading edge that would have been caught by short cover, had there been one
Jadeja stands tall on the back foot, rides the bounce and opens the face to guide towards third man
Dhoni strides forward and opens the face to guide a full ball behind point
defended on the back foot towards the off side, played that with a straighter bat
Jadeja once again stands tall on the back foot, getting on top of the bounce and guiding it towards third man. Quick running between the wickets
another sharp short ball, Jadeja jumps up, takes one hand off the bat and fends it down
he's handling these short balls well, much better than Raina did. Jadeja gets on his toes and opens the face to steer towards third man
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Jadeja moves forward and nudges the ball towards square
Dhoni moves forward and pushes the ball towards cover
Dhoni once again gets a leading edge while just trying to push the ball on the leg side, it falls short of the bowler
pushed down the ground towards long-off
bowled quick on off and middle from round the wicket, played back to the bowler on the front foot
nudged off the back foot towards square leg
Broad bowls a fuller length to Jadeja this time and he beats the bat as the batsman plays from his crease
Broad hits a good length and slants the ball away from the left-hander, Jadeja tries to cut but misses
punched off the back foot towards cover
good length around off stump, Jadeja drives past extra cover but not past mid-off running to his right
short of a length and straight, Jadeja stays on the back foot and punches the ball towards cover
Dhoni comes down to the pitch of the ball and closes the face to push the ball towards the vacant space in front of square leg
Swann slows it up and beats Dhoni's prod outside off
Dhoni nudges behind square and sets off, Jadeja sends him back, Dhoni makes it just in time and turns around and gives his partner a stare
this time the running is superb after Dhoni pushes the ball towards the empty space at square leg, Swann looks at the fielder running in from the deep rather unkindly
driven wide of the fielder at long off and again Jadeja runs superbly to return for the second
only the single this time after Dhoni pushes off the front foot towards long-off
played off the back foot towards cover and Jadeja would have been a goner had Anderson hit at the striker's end
driven front the crease towards mid-off
punched off the front foot through cover, where Stokes can't make a clean stop
pushed towards cover and they set off again! Risky run but the fielder can't hit the stumps at the bowler's end.
fuller length on middle and off stump, Jadeja makes a bit of room by moving towards leg and plays a flowing drive on the up through cover. Good looking shot but it's risky
short ball around off and Jadeja stands tall in his crease and cuts it down to the third-man boundary
Dhoni nudges off his pads towards square and scampers the single
another quick single after Jadeja pushes the ball off the front foot towards point, Kieswetter has to run after it
played back to the bowler from the crease
that's short and wide outside off stump, Dhoni goes back and cuts hard, there's a fielder in the deep though
Dhoni moves out of his crease to push towards long-on and continues running after making contact
Swann gets the ball to turn away from the left-hander after pitching outside off and beats the attempted cut
Bopara fires the ball down leg side at a speed that's quicker than that of RP Singh
played from the crease towards the off side
full ball outside off, Dhoni reaches out for it and drives through extra cover
Jadeja tries to drive away from his body and edges a full ball down to third man
shorter length and straighter line, Dhoni works the ball off his pads behind square
played back to the bowler from the crease
he's playing some good drives. This one is caressed through cover off the front foot and placed wide of the fielder in the deep
played off the pads on the back foot towards square
angles the ball into middle and leg, Jadeja blocks
defended watchfully on the front foot
shot! Not much room to work with outside off and the pace was quicker as well, Jadeja moves back, waits late and cuts the ball past short third man
that's cut from in front of the stumps towards backward point. Dangerous shot.
defended towards the bowler
Dhoni drives from the crease towards mid-off, Jadeja sets off for a single but gets sent back
width offered outside off and Dhoni cuts hard and places it well enough to get four in front of square. Powerful shot
Dhoni gets yorked but manages to bring his bat down in time
played off the back foot towards point
Bopara's so unlucky there! Dhoni aimed for another drive from his crease against a full delivery that swung in, he got an inside edge past the keeper for four more
defended towards cover off the back foot
pushed on the leg side off the front foot
defended off the back foot
played off the back foot behind point
bowled much slower by Swann, Jadeja waits and drives towards long on
Dhoni goes back to a shorter ball and swats it towards long-off
nudged off the front foot just behind square and Jadeja responds quickly to Dhoni's call
full ball wide outside off stump, Jadeja plays a flowing drive off the front foot through cover point
Dhoni moves back and across to nudge a length ball off his pads towards fine leg
Jadeja opens the face to guide a length ball towards third man
good length angling into the right-hander from just outside off, Dhoni defends
Dhoni gets to 50 by moving across and nudging the ball behind square, valuable innings for India, but they need him to bat right through to have any chance in this game
Jadeja stands in his crease and throws his bat at a short of a length ball that angles across him, he gets beaten by the bounce
defended on the front foot on the off side
pushed off the back foot towards cover
Dhoni comes forward and plays the ball towards midwicket
shorter length and Dhoni swats towards long-on
bowled straight on middle stump, Jadeja defends from deep in his crease
worked off the pads through square. "One, one," yells someone. I suspect it was Swann.
shorter length with width outside off stump, cut towards point
played from the crease towards mid-on
played towards midwicket
Dhoni goes on the back foot and gets a thick edge towards third man where Swann dives full length and slaps the ball back into the field before it hits the rope
played towards third man for a single
a full toss, driven from the crease towards cover
Swann drifts down leg side, Jadeja plays off his pads to short fine leg
full ball angling into the left-hander, Jadeja drives to midwicket
Jadeja tries to play on the leg side but gets hit on the pad
driven towards long-on from the crease
played off the front foot towards extra cover
Dhoni moves forward and pushes towards mid-on, midwicket cuts it off
Jadeja uses the width from Dernbach from round the stumps to steer the ball towards third man
Dernbach is moving the ball into Dhoni, who stays back and pushes towards mid-on
Dhoni tries to force a short of a length ball through cover and gets a thick edge towards third man
played towards point where Bell makes a diving save
Dernbach angles the ball into the left-hander from round the wicket, driven from the crease through cover
defended from the crease towards the off side
Jadeja strides to defend but gets an inside edge on the leg side
pushed down the ground towards long on for one
Jadeja strides forward and drives towards long-on
defended from the crease towards the leg side
pushed towards midwicket off the front foot
Dhoni lunges forward and drives towards point
short of a length outside off, Dhoni forces off the back foot towards deep cover
short ball outside off stump, Jadeja lets it go
the slower ball but it's down leg side
defended on the back foot towards the off
good length, angling into the left-hander, Jadeja plays to point and sprints, the throw at the bowler's end scatters the pigeons
full ball swinging into the right-hander, flicked through midwicket
pushed off the back foot towards cover point
Dhoni steps forward to tuck defensively to midwicket
cracking delivery! Swann tosses up a perfect offspinner outside off and Dhoni is very nearly bowled through the gate as it rips in off the surface. Saved by an inside edge and a hint of pad
Dhoni responds with caution, tapping into the off side
the arm ball this time from Swann, and the ball squirts off the outer half of Dhoni's bat towards point
nicely flighted once again by Swann, Dhoni lunging forward to drive back to the bowler
a slapped drive sends the ball racing down to long-off, but there's a man down there so it's just the single
Dhoni is on the hop as he scythes a cut behind square, third man sprinting round the boundary to stop the shot
a hint of nip off this good surface, the ball coming in to Dhoni as he stays deep in his crease and nudges to long-on
perhaps just a little short of a good length, but Broad does at least keep Jadeja quiet as the ball is dinked to midwicket. Jadeja's barely scored a run on the leg side in this innings
ah, mis-directed down the leg side by Broad, Kieswetter shuffling quickly across to take
Broad has lost his radar here as another delivery is floated harmlessly down the leg side
a better line, but it does allow Jadeja to force on the up through point for a couple, taking this partnership to 100
an angled bat sends the ball bouncing down to third man, and another single is added to the total
pushed back down the track to end the over, Broad fielding in his follow through
length ball on leg and middle, pushed towards midwicket from the crease
Dhoni gets a thick edge towards third man, he was trying to force through cover. Dhoni's got some issue with his leg, not running as fast as he usually does
played of the back foot towards mid-on
slightly short and Dhoni pulls the ball towards deep square and charges for the single, he didn't look troubled there
full ball around off, Jadeja drives towards cover
Anderson gifts Jadeja his fifty with one on the pads, Jadeja accepts and glances to the fine-leg boundary
slower ball outside off, Dhoni hits hit hard off the back foot but can't beat cover.
that's a full toss but Dhoni fails to cash in, hitting it straight to square leg
terrific slower ball, cramps Jadeja for room with the angle from round the wicket, Jadeja defends
another slower ball, and it's a yorker as well, Jadeja digs it out towards cover
and another slower ball, just inside the tram line on the off side, Dhoni decides to let it go
he ends the over with another slower ball, which Dhoni plays to point, top over from Dernbach

caught! It's a low full toss and Dhoni's attempt at hitting through midwicket ends up in a scoop over the bowler's head. Cook runs to his right from mid-on and takes a simple catch. Dhoni looked restricted in his movement in these last few overs
Jadeja tries to drive through the off side but can't find the gap
driven from the crease towards mid-off
full ball on middle and leg stump, Ashwin clips to fine leg
full ball on middle, Jadeja makes room and drives towards mid-off, where Cook is a bit deep
defended on the back foot towards cover for a quick single
the first one isn't a slower ball, it's a fast one down leg side and Ashwin gets some bat on it, sending it racing to the fine-leg boundary
this one is quick as well, Ashwin defends on the off side
what a shot that is! Short ball just outside off stump, Ashwin deliberately chips it over the wicketkeeper for four. Dernbach's lost it a bit, the slower ones were working superbly
short of a length outside off, Ashwin drives off the back foot through cover
that's a slower ball, but it's on leg stump and Jadeja's ready and waiting, he swings it high towards deep backward square for a one-bounce four
that's a faster one, full outside off, Jadeja makes room and blasts it through the off side to make it 19 off the over
Bresnan delivers a yorker, which Ashwin forces out towards the bowler. Bresnan doesn't field cleanly and allows the single
in the blockhole around off stump, driven from the crease towards mid-off
Ashwin's placement is striking, he's dug out this full ball outside off and squeezed it past short third man towards the boundary
Ashwin heaves a slower one towards long-on to take India past 200
another yorker, which Ashwin keeps out
that's down the leg side but the umpire indicates it brushed Jadeja on the way through to Kieswetter
Ashwin backs away towards leg, Anderson follows him with a length ball, Ashwin swats through square
full ball around off stump, Jadeja stays in his crease and blasts it flat and over the head of the fielder at mid-off
and again! The fielder at mid-off is a bit wide and Jadeja hits through Anderson's full line to the long-off boundary
the slower ball and Jadeja cuts from his stumps to short third man, the throw from Bresnan at the bowler's end concedes an overthrow
Jadeja flays the full ball back at Anderson, who sticks his shoe out and deflects the ball towards mid-off
It's Ashwin this time, makes room by moving towards leg and lofts a length ball down the ground. India have scored 51 for 1 off the batting Powerplay. Bizarre turn of events.
Jadeja lofts a fuller ball towards long-on
a full toss and Ashwin smashes it towards wide long-on, where Anderson does the fielding
Ashwin has certainly worked on his batting, he used to be a bit of a mug. He moves across his stumps and scoops a low full toss over the head of the man at short fine leg
in the blockhole outside off stump, Ashwin gets beaten
full and wide outside off, Ashwin reaches for it and cuts to third man
a full toss but Jadeja mis-times the hit towards long-on, Jadeja goes back for the second and makes his ground before the stumps are broken by Kieswetter
a slower ball and Ashwin manages to swat it past the bowler. That's one out of four?

that's the second slower ball and Jadeja gets under it and sends it into orbit. He's hit it miles in the air down the ground but not far enough. Bell settles under the ball a few feet inside the boundary at long-on
Ashwin's standing on off stump, exposing middle and leg, to create hitting space on the leg side. He swats it between midwicket and mid-on
blockhole delivery and Praveen can only play it back to the bowler, Ashwin's out of his ground but Dernbach doesn't throw
that slower ball is too wide outside off stump, Praveen swings and misses, Ashwin runs a bye to the keeper, Kieswetter hits at the striker's end but Ashwin is safe
Ashwin tries to scoop again but can't get it past short fine leg this time
full ball on off and middle, Praveen stays in his crease and drives through cover

inn2.comm: predictably, there's prodigious movement for Praveen from the start, but rather more surprisingly he's shot this one down way outside off and it's called wide
a better line, closer to Cook. Some appreciable wobble takes the ball away from him as he leaves alone
and again, Cook letting an away swinger pass him unhindered outside off
Cook sets England's chase on its course with a neat little punch through the gap at cover. It's a cautious shot, without much power in it, but they're still back for the second
Cook has another look at one that leaves him through the air, letting it go
a good, probing line from Praveen, who zones in on off stump. The length was good too, nice and full but not quite there for the drive as Cook came forward to defend
beaten outside off! Great line from Praveen, and Cook can't help but have a little fiddle outside off. Past the edge
movement straight away, the ball curving back in through the air. Kieswetter is equal to it, however, pressing forward and collecting a single past mid-off
punched firmly to extra cover off the back foot
RP searches for swing, floating one right up to Cook who leans into a crunchy drive
RP finds a tempting line with a length delivery outside off, but Cook doesn't take the bait, leaving alone

past the edge! Cook didn't want to let a second one pass him. This one was a little wider, swinging away once more, and he aimed a full-blooded cut at it, only for the ball to zip past the outside edge

Cook collects the first boundary of the chase, leaning into a square drive on the up and threading the gap between the point and cover fielders. It wasn't the most authoritative shot, the ball coming off the outer half of the bat, but its the runs that count

has this gone too far? Praveen launches into an appeal as Kieswetter - who had shuffled right across to off - is struck on the pad by an inswinger. The umpire says no, and that could well have been heading down the leg side. Not too far off though
nicely full from Praveen, drawing Cook forward to drive to mid-off
the off side was reinforced after Cook's boundary in the last over, and that seems a good decision as he drives well square but picks out the extra man in front of point
fetched from outside off with plent of wrist. Mid-on cuts it off, but can't stop the single
well, he's only just nudging 80mph but that is a brute of a delivery from Praveen, the ball lifting and jagging away from Kieswetter off the surface. Extravagant movement, too much to catch the edge
Praveen hits a good length outside off, and after the last delivery Kieswetter is happy to let this one go
and there might have been a wicket if there was a third! Cook pushes away from his body at one that leaves him through the air, the thick edge flying down to third man
Kieswetter stays deep in his crease to defend
shot! And good fielding too. Kieswetter stretches his left leg down the wicket and drives hard to extra cover, where the fielder gets a hand to it and saves two runs
Kieswetter on the charge! He steps down the track to RP, whipping the ball powerfully over midwicket for his first boundary
nice riposte from RP, who gets this one to straighten away from Kieswetter's poking bat outside off. Beaten
on a length, and snaking in through the air as Kieswetter keeps it out with a slightly cramped defence
Praveen goes past the edge again! He's done that a few times to Cook already, who is beaten trying to cut one that swings prodigiously away from him
fuller and straighter from Praveen, Cook propping half forward to nudge it back down the track
good nip from Praveen as this one hits the seam and jags back in to Cook, beating his swishing bat and striking him above the waist
whipped out to deep square on the leg side
there's not much swing on this one but it does hit the seam, coming in to Kieswetter, who flicks it to the man at short fine leg
boom! Kieswetter has had enough of nudging and pushing, dancing down the wicket to smite a hapless Praveen high over wide long-on

decent pace from RP, but the length is just a little short of perfect and Cook hops back to nurdle a couple through the leg side. I say nurdle, but he got a pretty good connection on that and it took some good fielding to stop runs
Cook steps forward to cream a drive to extra cover, but picks out the fielder with precision. That'll sting the hands.
Cook hasn't quite been his fluent self on the cut today - at least not yet - and now he's bottom-edged another attempt at the shot, the ball bouncing through to Dhoni
the England captain stays deep in his crease to force this to cover, but again he can't beat the field
punched back past the bowler, who bends in his follow through but can't get a hand to it. Mid-on sprints round to keep them to one

wild ball, wild shot! Short, wide and ballooning up outside off from RP. Kieswetter responds with a flailing uppercut. Umpire Erasmus isn't impressed at either of them, turning to signal wide with minimal emotion
a gift from RP, with this field. There's no-one down at fine leg, and Kieswetter has helped the ball down to the boundary there with a one-legged paddle-pull
nice, attacking length from Praveen, right up to the bat. Cook responds with a straight-batted push down the ground
Kieswetter presses forward to aim a defensive push to cover
flicked off the pads
a gentle punch just straight of mid-off brings a scampered single
Praveen gets excited as another probing delivery is defended by Kieswetter. Nice direction from the bowler

well, that had been such a good over until this point. Praveen loses his line, floating this one down leg, and Kieswetter bends into an explosive pick-up over fine leg, a spectator beyond the boundary spilling the chance
decent enough start from Munaf, immediately pinging a full length to get Cook defending
well bowled once more, full and straight and Cook offers a vertical defensive bat
a hint of width offered this time, and Cook leans forward to crack the ball on the up to extra cover
good wheels from Munaf, who once again zones in on a good line as Cook defends
slapped through cover! Too full, too wide, and on this pitch Cook wasn't going to miss out.
another four, another good over ruined. Munaf over-corrected after the last ball and was whipped to midwicket, the fielder chasing the ball all the way to the boundary
slanted across the right-hander, who raises his bat to leave
pushed across Kieswetter once more, who shoulders arms yet again
Kieswetter skips out and away to leg, attempting to thrash the ball through - or over - cover. The ball hits the toe-end of the bat, however, and is easily stopped
a low, dipping full toss is tapped to cover in slightly ungainly fashion, but enough space is found for a quick single that brings up England's fifty
nudged between mid-on and midwicket, and there's a slightly late call for a single. No major alarms
pitched right up to the bat again, Kieswetter digging the ball out towards mid-on and immediately setting off for a sprinted single
perhaps just short of a good length from Munaf, but he offers no width whatsoever and Kieswetter steps back to defend under the eyes
Kieswetter picks up two runs with an utterly agricultural hack to leg, the ball taking the bottom edge and dribbling behind square on the leg side
scooped up and over cover for six! It's that trademark Kieswetter shot, the batsman stepping out and giving himself acres of room in which to free his arms and murder the ball over the off side
and he follows that up with watchful defence
in the air, but in the gap and well timed from Kieswetter as he chips to wide long-on. Rahane hauls it in just before the rope

that is absolutely plumb! Cook leaned over too far and had to play around his front pad as Munaf aimed full and straight. The appeal was immediate and vociferous, and Marais Erasmus' finger quickly shot up. Well, that takes the gloss off what had been an excellent start from England, and the breakthrough should raise India's spirits
this is accurate enough from him and Kieswetter drops to leg
fullish and straightish, Kieswetter is a bundle of energy, pushes to midwicket and scampers up and down the pitch
clipped firmly down the ground, this time Kieswetter can take the single
quietly defended to cover. Trott then returns to his main job, marking his guard
neatly done by Trott. Walks over to the off side and flicks a single off his hip. RP Singh holding a decent line
Kieswetter tries to give himself some room to open up the off side but his drive finds mid-off
fullish on the pads and Trott tucks away behind square
Kieswetter blocks a fullish delivery back to the bowler
uppish! Munaf disguised his (even) slower ball well and Kieswetter's punch drive went one-bounce to cover
Kieswetter jumps leg side to ping a cover drive to the sweeper on the rope
Trott defends a very straight Munaf delivery. You won't get many less fussy players than these two
quietly pushed to midwicket
decent start around off stump and guided wide of point
good grief! Where has this guy been all tour!? Spins and bounces past a groping outside edge!
careful and cagey from Trott. You don't take risks against Jadeja if you value your wicket
touch shorter, Trott aims a cut but can't connect firmly
careful defence around off stump
good opening over then from India's answer to Sobers
Kieswetter has settled well into his knock now and pushes a single to long-off
Trott presents the straightest of bats to the straightest of balls
again Trott blocks crisply to mid-on. 2 off 12...
there we go, no need to get all tetchy about Trott. Opens the face and slides to third man

oh no! Dropped by Munaf. As far as C&Bs go that was a gimme. Kieswetter popped a leading edge back to the bowler ever so gently, Munaf had to move a tiny bit to his right I suppose but he spilled it. On second viewing it was possibly a touch tougher than it first looked but most bowlers would have gobbled it
ah, insult to injury as Kieswetter jumps leg side, Munaf follows and then the ball is flipped past short fine leg away
Dhoni thinks he might be on to something as the bails were taken off after Trott defended back to him but Trott's foot was grounded
clumped down the ground firmly
Kieswetter finds a gap square of cover
point is deep, which to Trott is a nonsense, so the buffet single is taken
quietly defended into the off side but the field is set deep, which is understandable to Kieswetter
that deep point again allows Trott a single
R Ashwin starts on off stump and is pushed neatly towards cover
Kieswetter gets down on one knee to flip this over his shoulder but the star that is PK hares around from wide fine leg to scrape this inside the line in time
fifty for Kieswetter, and a mighty good one too
Trott happy to slide this square of the wicket
more good lines from Ashwin, not much turn for him but he's bowling with lots of overspin
this time Ashwin does find turn, too much turn as it happens. Trott misses his sweep and looked very much in trouble when he was hit in front but it was actually spinning way past leg
knocked into the leg side for a single
Trott gets deep into his crease and nudges behind square  on the leg side
top fielding from Raina in the off-side ring
big appeal as the arm ball finds the pads, but it was heading down
wow. After the one that slides on this rips a mile! Kieswetter poked but was nowhere near it. Jadeja eh? Who would have thought it...
gone! Well deserved too! Kieswetter plays outside of the ball, expecting turn that never came and Jadeja's straight one skipped through the gate to peg back middle
Trott will love this. Dig in, sit in, grind, and probably win the game for England
worked down the ground with a flick of the wrists
oooh, nervy start for Bell! Ashwin spins this plenty from outside off. It really spun sharply but hit Bell's pad probably a fraction outside the line
classic Bell paddle sweep dinked for a single
Trott has gone! What a delivery! Went the other way after drawing Trott forward, slid past the outside edge and hit off stump! Absolutely wonderful bowling
ooh, massive appeal and it would have hit but it struck Stokes outside the line. Was he offering a shot?
Bell caresses a drive to deep cover
Stokes is off the mark, which will be a relief for him
Bell has plenty of responsibility now and pushes this away for one into the off side
nervous swiping from Stokes! Just heaved haplessly at the ball but was struck on the pads
better, much better from Stokes. Crisply pushed to mid-off
worked away for one. What a day Jadeja is having
full delivery, yorker almost. The field has come in, couple of slips in place too!
spin! Real turn here, Ashwin looks full of beans. Stokes pokes nervously
again defended with no real conviction
sweep aimed, more desperation than confidence, but a single is the result
Bell quietly works with the turn around the corner
Stokes sees out the over. I hate to say this but... rain is lurking
regulation offbreak outside off, left alone
tosses this up, draws Stokes out, defended back to him
beaten outside off! Stokes backed away to take a swipe and found thin air
punched down to long-off
a measured clip to midwicket
forward, and driven to covers
Bell makes room to cut, but an excellent diving interception at point
not such an excellent interception! Mid-on dives over the ball and they run one
too short, and pulled gleefully through midwicket for a welcome boundary
delicate work from Bell! Just opened the face and guided the ball through third man and out of the reach of a valiant but futile dive
driven straight to short cover, the end of a profitable over
this is the arm ball, big shout for lbw, but Stokes has got an inside edge on this
swept from outside off, keeps this down, wide of deep backward square
Stokes is nervous against the spinners here. This is a nothing shot from Stokes, a big hoick from well outside off, aiming for midwicket, gets a thick edge that falls wide of short third
this is better, worked down the ground, towards long-on
the carrom ball, Bell watchfully defends this back
slightly short, and he rocks back to cut this away for a single
he is jumping back the moment he sees the low trajectory. doesn't matter what length it is. He has cut this length ball from in front of the stumps
quick and flat again, into the pads, helped away for a single
beaten on the cut, the late-cut actually. A touch too full for the shot
defended off the front foot
another short-of-a-length ball, and he cuts this in front of square
Stokes might have looked edgy earlier, but there was nothing edgy about this pick-up shot over long-on, which has gone at least 20 rows back
flicked into the leg side for a quick single
again Stokes charges down the track, this time he doesn't get a good connection and the ball skims down to long on
Bell shifts his weight back and works with the spin behind square on the leg side, calling for the run as the shot is played
Stokes is like a deer on ice as he skips round into a switch hit and then loses his footing, tumbling over but managing to keep himself safely grounded inside the crease
cut away with the spin but stopped at point
the arm ball almost does for Stokes! He played for turn when there was none, a much quicker ball shooting through the gap between bat and pad and zipping over the top of middle
speared down flat and fast on off stump, Bell nudging to midwicket

what's happened here? Another quicker ball from Raina raps Bell on the pad and rolls away to leg. Bell thinks of the single and wanders out of his crease, but a quick-thinking Dhoni sprints, picks up the ball and shies at the stumps all in one movement, a direct hit finding Bell inches short of his ground. Sharp work from India's captain, and he's given his team the early advantage after the re-start
Bopara stays right back to work his first delivery to midwicket
punched to mid on with a high left elbow
pushed the other way this time, to mid off, but still no run to be had
turned to fine leg, and Bopara ends a good, tight over with a quick single
looped up by Ashwin, Bopara driving to long off
leading edge! Stokes is done in by the spin, but the ball drops short of point. These are really nervy moments for England
beaten on the inside edge this time! Speared in quicker by Ashwin, the ball rushing past Stokes' bat to strike him on the thigh

gone! India are taking this game by the scruff of the neck. A fidgety Stokes moved right across to off - too far - as Ashwin hurled one down full and straight, the ball rattling the stumps on the full.
flicked off the toes behind square, and Bresnan is off the mark straight away
Timing! Placement! Bopara! Could this be his night? The ball was certainly there to be hit - a looping full toss - but he was spot on with the shot, driving nervelessly through extra cover
a quicker one (aren't they all?) from Raina hurries Bresnan's defence
punched to cover off the back foot, finding the fielder
driven to mid on this time. India are really buzzing in the field now, there's a palpable energy in their gameplay
driven away off the front foot, just the single
sharp turn and bounce! Bopara really didn't have much idea about this one, which ragged sharply in off the pitch. Fortunately for him, the bounce took it over the stumps
eased down to long off, and they take an ambled single

a much quicker arm ball from Ashwin, it's nurdled to midwicket and they charge through for a quick single ... Raina was the fielder there and he hurled a shy at the stumps off balance, giving away a couple of overthrows. Pandemonium. Dhoni runs over for a quick word with his fielder
Bresnan follows that up with cautious defence
worked to leg, just the single
nice and straight from Ashwin, nothing really for Bopara to work with
good loop from the bowler, Bopara comes forward and defends with an angled bat
good end to the over, Bopara tapping defensively to leg
a long half volley is driven to long on with minimal flourish
poor line from Raina, arrowing this one down the leg side. It kissed Bopara's pad on the way down, and they take a couple of leg byes as Munaf creaks round to stop the ball
turned off the pads for one
not a hint of flight on this from Raina, and Bresnan stays back to force to long on
again Raina slips towards leg, but he's not punished as Bopara's glance finds square leg
cracked straight back to the bowler, India's spinners asphyxiate a little more
squirted off the outer half of the bat, and it's stopped at point

they've run four! Well, you can't fault Parthiv for effort. The ball was whipped out to long leg, Parthiv hared after it, diving in front of the boundary to parry it back, getting up again to chase the ball again, and knocking it back once more

chipped over cover! Bresnan didn't look in control of this, one hand coming off the bat handle as he played the shot, but the ball pinged out of the middle and found the gap to the right of the cover sweeper
Munaf's legcutter is too good for Bresnan, the batsman groping outside off as the ball fizzes past him
slower one from Munaf, but Bresnan does read this one and taps to cover
Munaf is screaming himself hoarse as two more runs are given away, Bresnan pulling out into the deep. This really wasn't Parthiv's fault though, there's no way he could've kept them to one
what fielding from Raina! It looked as though Bopara would find an easy single to long on, but Raina leapt to his right and plucked the ball out of the air in mid-air.
turned straight to square leg
this time he does find the gap, just the one
again great fielding by Raina off his own bowling as Bresnan drives powerfully back down the wicket
flicked to square leg
dropped by Dhoni! These ones either stick or they don't. Bresnan got a really thick edge as he went back to punch off the back foot, the ball hit Dhoni's gloves and popped out straight away
Bopara lashes at width without much timing but gets a sharp single as Kohli fields smartly
Bresnan has looked cool so far, not too nervy, and defends to leg
Munaf slams down a short ball which Bresnan smashes hard to deep midwicket
Bopara edges down the wicket but only to guide straight to point. Bopara wanted a single but had to be sent back rapidly
touch slower from Munaf and Bopara's punch drive was airy! Just short of cover but pressure building
with a slightly more open face this time Bopara manages to pierce the off-side field and keep the strike
just about. Touch of outside edge but it ends steered wide of point for a single
solid block from Bresnan pushing forward
misfield at cover is followed by some better, desperate stuff from Praveen on the boundary, all of which means Bresnan gets two
pushed away for a single into space
ah that will do nicely, Bopara rocks on to his back foot to back-cut past the keeper for a much-needed boundary
solidly blocked down to long-on
more conviction on this Bopara drive as Munaf offers a fraction of width outside off stump
straight from Munaf and straight from Bresnan
firmly driven out to deep cover, Bresnan has looked rock solid
hung full and wide of off stump, Bopara had to reach for his drive but kept it down well
Bresnan manages to shove this from around middle behind square on the leg side for a couple more
Bresnan makes it six runs off the over by clumping a fuller ball down to long-off
spin straight away! Finds an edge too, but Bresnan's hands are soft
this time it's short enough for Bresnan to rock back and cut
touch more air here from the bowler and Bopara works it with the angle to midwicket
wonderful stop from Raina at cover - one-handed dive plucks it out and stops the run
hauled into the leg side but just for a single. Brings up an excellent 50 stand though
driven hard, but straight to cover. Where's your money?
good start from RP Singh, straight, decent enough pace. Bresnan drops to his feet and is called through for a quick single
Bopara finds the infield with a check-drive as RP locates a good length and line again. Run a ball needed
Bopara hops down the wicket and flicks to deep midwicket
this is excellent stuff from RP Singh. Given how poor he was last time he was at The Oval, this is a mighty big improvement. Yorker blocked out
Bresnan manages to get this away, but only for a single down the ground
shot Bopara! That eases the equation slightly! Bopara edged down the wicket, RP Singh dragged it short and Bopara dispatched it to the midwicket boundary
sharp work from Dhoni, collecting down the leg side and whipping the bails off. Wrong line from Jadeja though
Jadeja is trying to cramp Bresnan, good plan, but slightly overdoes it and Bresnan can drag it to the leg side
excellent timing on this drive, all along the ground, but straight to the boundary rider on the off side
firmly blocked back to the bowler
this is fired well outside off stump, Bresnan flays and misses

that swings it back India's way! Bresnan falls and it's that man Jadeja who works the magic for India. Angled in from around the wicket, slid on with the arm and through an attempted cut to peg back middle. Excellent innings from Bresnan but may not be enough
watchful start from Broad, defending carefully. Excellent over from Jadeja, he's made this match
touch too straight from Munaf and Bopara flicks behind square for a well-run couple
full toss but excellent fielding at cover keeps the drive to a single
ooh, slower ball is chipped uppishly. Broad was hoodwinked and it went up and looped down short of long-off
neither of the England batsmen are picking Munaf's slower one. Here Bopara checks his drive at the last moment to send it to long-off
Broad digs out a yorker to steal a single
full toss is clumped hard down towards long-on who runs around well to field. Munaf is disgusted with the effort but it looked a good one to me
Ashwin starts with a straighter ball that is worked very carefully towards midwicket for a single
that will do for England, Bopara just blocking firmly to beat the infield and collect a single to long-on
Broad sweep, without perfect timing, and Munaf fields slowly
lovely work from Bopara. Saw it a touch shorter and hopped back and outside leg to ease a cut shot past cover for four

just as it seemed Bopara was taking England home Ashwin has struck! Wonderful bowling! Touch of air, Bopara was through his shot and it spun back viciously through the gate to dislodge the bail over leg stump. To flight it up after being hit for four is excellent bowling
Swann very careful  and tickles a shortish ball for a single to leg

Swann gets two when it looked like he might not even get a single! Dug out to point where Kohli threw down at the bowler's end, Munaf wasn't behind the sticks and it went for an extra run. Munaf is furious but I'm not sure he has a right to be
again Swann digs out a fuller ball towards cover, this time it is just a single
excellent line and length from the bowler but the equation is in England's favour. Bunted down to long-on for another single
clean strike from Swann and that might be the boundary that breaks the game! Munaf went slower but Swann is always happy driving and crisply struck it past mid-off for four!
that's it! Swann finishes it by stealing a quick single to mid-off. Much, much better game today. Swann punches the air towards the England dressing room
